00479       bool inactive() const {
00480         return INACTIVE==m_state;
00481       }
00482       bool active() const {
00483         return ACTIVE==m_state;
00484       }
00485       bool invalid() const {
00486         return INVALID==m_state;
00487       }
00488       void mark_inactive() {
00489         m_state = INACTIVE;
00490       }
00491       void mark_active();
00492       void mark_invalid() {
00493         m_state = INVALID;

00541 #define TREX_REGISTER_CONSTRAINT(assembly, class_name, label, propagator)\
00542   {  \
00543     EUROPA::ConstraintEngine* ce = (EUROPA::ConstraintEngine*) assembly.getComponent("ConstraintEngine"); \
00544     REGISTER_CONSTRAINT(ce->getCESchema(), class_name, #label, #propagator);\
00545   }
00546 
00547 #define TREX_REGISTER_FLAW_FILTER(assembly, class_name, label) \
00548   REGISTER_FLAW_FILTER(((EUROPA::SOLVERS::ComponentFactoryMgr*)assembly.getComponent("ComponentFactoryMgr")), class_name, label);
00549 
00550 #define TREX_REGISTER_FLAW_HANDLER(assembly, class_name, label) \
00551   REGISTER_FLAW_HANDLER(((EUROPA::SOLVERS::ComponentFactoryMgr*)assembly.getComponent("ComponentFactoryMgr")), class_name, label);
00552 
00553 #define TREX_REGISTER_FLAW_MANAGER(assembly, class_name, label) \
00554   REGISTER_FLAW_MANAGER(((EUROPA::SOLVERS::ComponentFactoryMgr*)assembly.getComponent("ComponentFactoryMgr")), class_name, label);
00555 
00556 #define TREX_REGISTER_COMPONENT_FACTORY(assembly, class_name, label) \
00557   REGISTER_COMPONENT_FACTORY(((EUROPA::SOLVERS::ComponentFactoryMgr*)assembly.getComponent("ComponentFactoryMgr")), class_name, label);
